topic.title: Ansho Rei - A blog about ZeroNet, Programming and possibly Life
topic.body:
I'll mostly be talking about ZeroNet and programming on this blog, but I might post some short stories, or musings I've had during the day as well.

Link: [Ansho Rei](/13T79X7tG8Fi3EZCev3xU1wYTtFHHnqWGQ/)

topic.title: ZeroNet in the Eyes of the Media

1566347337_1CgdRv2BFaVqNfmK3qGVYDuA7EDmk.body:
I do now. I'm glad people appreciate the site. Feel free to suggest articles, events and other relevant material to add.

Anyone remember the exact date of the Summer Vacation Vulnerability discovery? I would like to add it.
thank you, no nothing wrong with that text, it should be clearer now that it's an event and not an article
